thread.title: BRIEF-Kudelski says NAGRA end-to-end solutions selected by VTVcab in Vietnam
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Kudelski says NAGRA end-to-end solutions selected by VTVcab in Vietnam | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-Kudelski says NAGRA end-to-end solutions selected by VTVcab in Vietnam
text:
Sept 10 Kudelski SA :
* NAGRA's (a division of Kudelski) anyCAST content protection, OpenTV 5 connectware and medialive multiscreen solution were selected by VTVcab, Vietnam's cable operator, to enable its next generation TV platform Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
